title: Healthcare Practical Competency Strengthening: Real-World Scenario Assessment-Based Approach for Social Sector Skill Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Social science theoretical foundations and understanding of job-related basic concepts
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Students can write data-driven policy proposals through analysis of real-world social issues
Learners can complete final deliverables by assigning roles with team members using digital collaboration tools
Participants can write analytical reports on social phenomena according to professional reporting formats and undergo presentation evaluations
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
